authentication.noRightsUpdateEvent: You have insufficient rights to edit events.

cookieConsent.checkboxAccept: I have read and accept the terms of service
cookieConsent.checkboxAcceptAriaLabel: I have read and accept the terms of service
cookieConsent.text1: By selecting “accept” you agree to the terms of service. Next, you must accept either essential or all cookies.
cookieConsent.text2: Read more about our privacy policy and registry description.
cookieConsent.text3: We use cookies to improve your user experience on the site.
cookieConsent.title: Linked Events Terms of Use and Cookies

accessibility.statusMessage: {{count}} option is available, use up and down arrow keys to navigate. Press Enter key to select.
accessibility.statusMessage_plural: {{count}} options are available, use up and down arrow keys to navigate. Press Enter key to select.

imageUploader.buttonDropImage: Drop an image into the area or add from your computer by clicking
imageUploader.tooLargeFileSize: File size is too large. Maximum file size is {{maxSize}} MB

errors.authorizationRequired: Sign in to perform this action
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this operation.
errors.validationError: There are errors on the form. Please check the form.

cancelEventModal.text1: This action cancels the event. You can also postpone the event, or delete an event that you entered accidentally.
cancelEventModal.text2: The following events will be cancelled:
cancelEventModal.textPastEventAreNotUpdated: Please also note that the changes only apply to future events in the series. Past events in the series are not cancelled when cancelling the umbrella event.
cancelEventModal.title: Cancel event
cancelEventModal.titlePastEventAreNotUpdated: Past events in the series will not be cancelled
cancelEventModal.warning: Remember that instead of canceling, you can also host the event remotely online. In this case, use the edit form to select Internet as the venue. You can also postpone the event to the future.

deleteEventModal.text1: This function permanently deletes the event.
deleteEventModal.text2: If necessary, you can also cancel or postpone the event.
deleteEventModal.text3: The following events will be deleted:
deleteEventModal.title: Delete event

buttonAddImage.course: Add a photo of the course
buttonAddImage.event: Add a photo of the event

buttonPanel.warningNoRightsCreate: You have insufficient rights to create this event.
buttonPanel.warningNoRightsToPublish: You have insufficient rights to publish this event.
buttonPanel.warningNotAuthenticated: You must be logged in to create events.

form.checkboxIsVerified: I verify that the information I have provided is correct and I undertake to comply with all instructions and regulations concerning the courses and events of the City of Helsinki.

editButtonPanel.warningCannotPublishSubEvent: A sub event of a series cannot be published.
editButtonPanel.warningNoRightsToEdit: You have insufficient rights to edit this event.

form.helperUmbrellaEvent: Note. An umbrella event must be created before you can add subevents to it.

image.labelAltText: Alternate image text for screen readers (alt text)

eventOnly.course: Image may be used only for this course
eventOnly.event: Image may be used only for this event

image.placeholderAltText: Enter image alt text for screen readers
image.titleImportFromHardDisk: Import new image from your hard disk

infoTextAttendeeCapacity.course: If the number of participants in the course is limited, specify the minimum and maximum number of participants here.
infoTextAttendeeCapacity.event: If the number of participants in the event is limited, specify the minimum and maximum number of participants here.

infoTextAudience.course: If the course does not have a specific target group, don't select anything
infoTextAudience.event: If the event does not have a specific target group, don't select anything

infoTextAudienceAge.course: If only people of a certain age are allowed to participate in the course, set the age limits here.
infoTextAudienceAge.event: If only people of a certain age are allowed to participate in the event, set the age limits here.

infoTextDescription1.course: A short description is displayed in some services when there is no space for a long description. It tells the most essential things about the course concisely.
infoTextDescription1.event: A short description is displayed in some services when there is no space for a long description. It tells the most essential things about the event concisely.

infoTextDescription2.course: The description is a longer and more detailed description of the content of the course.
infoTextDescription2.event: The description is a longer and more detailed description of the content of the event.

infoTextEnrolmentTime.course: If it is possible to register for the course, specify the start and end times of the registration here.
infoTextEnrolmentTime.event: If it is possible to register for the event, specify the start and end times of the registration here.

infoTextEventTimes1.course: To add a multi-day recurring course, there is an Add New Time button and a regular Recurring Course tool for a regularly recurring course.
infoTextEventTimes1.event: To add a multi-day recurring event, there is an Add New Time button and a regular Recurring Event tool for a regularly recurring event.

infoTextEventTimes2.course: Enter the start date of the course and also the start time if the course starts at a specific time.
infoTextEventTimes2.event: Enter the start date of the event and also the start time if the event starts at a specific time.

infoTextEventTimes3.course: Also enter the end date as well as the end time if the course ends at a specific time.
infoTextEventTimes3.event: Also enter the end date as well as the end time if the event ends at a specific time.

infoTextEventTimes4.course: If the course is held more than once, you can add new dates to the course. If the course repeats regularly, you can add all times at once by selecting Recurring Course.
infoTextEventTimes4.event: If the event is held more than once, you can add new dates to the event. If the event repeats regularly, you can add all times at once by selecting Recurring Event.

form.infoTextEventTimes5: To delete an extra time, select the minus symbol next to the time.

infoTextImage1.course: Always try to find a picture for the course. The image can be licensed under Creative Commons 4.0 BY, in which case the image can be shared and modified quite freely, or "Use limited to the course ". Some freely usable illustrations can be found on the event images page.
infoTextImage1.event: Always try to find a picture for the event. The image can be licensed under Creative Commons 4.0 BY, in which case the image can be shared and modified quite freely, or "Use limited to the event ". Some freely usable illustrations can be found on the event images page.

form.infoTextImage2: Before uploading, edit the image to fit the network and to a 3: 2 horizontal aspect ratio, such as 1200 × 800px. It is essential that the file size remains reasonable for mobile use as well, preferably less than 200 kilobytes (kb).
form.infoTextImage3: Give the image a name and briefly describe what is happening in it.
form.infoTextImage4: Alt text improves accessibility because screen readers pass alt text to the user. So describe the content of the picture in an understandable way.

infoTextInfoLanguages.course: Select the languages in which you want to display course information for this service.
infoTextInfoLanguages.event: Select the languages in which you want to display event information for this service.

infoTextInLanguages.course: Select the languages which will be used for communication during the course.
infoTextInLanguages.event: Select the languages which will be used for communication during the event.

infoTextKeywords.course: Attach at least one keyword to the course that describes the theme of the course. Start typing a keyword and select the keyword you want to add from the list below.
infoTextKeywords.event: Attach at least one keyword to the event that describes the theme of the event. Start typing a keyword and select the keyword you want to add from the list below.

form.infoTextLocation1: Enter the name or street address of the venue in the field and select the correct venue from the list.

infoTextLocation2.course: If the course is only held remotely on the Internet, select Internet as the venue. The course URL is entered in the home page field and / or the course on social media fields.
infoTextLocation2.event: If the event is only held remotely on the Internet, select Internet as the venue. The event URL is entered in the home page field and / or the event on social media fields.

form.infoTextLocation3: If the venue is found in the list, its location does not need to be described separately. However, you can provide additional information to find the venue, such as the floor number or classroom name.
form.infoTextLocation4: If the exact venue is not found in the list, select the nearest street address as the venue and enter the name of the venue or other detailed arrival instructions in the additional information field.

infoTextMainCategories.course: Please select at least one main category. Using the right main categories makes it easier to find the course.
infoTextMainCategories.event: Please select at least one main category. Using the right main categories makes it easier to find the event.

infoTextOffers1.course: Indicate if the course is free. Enter the price for the chargeable course in the form “5€”.
infoTextOffers1.event: Indicate if the event is free. Enter the price for the chargeable event in the form “5€”.

infoTextOffers2.course: If the course has several prices, click “Add new price information” and enter the name of each price group (e.g. Children) in the Description of price information field.
infoTextOffers2.event: If the event has several prices, click “Add new price information” and enter the name of each price group (e.g. Children) in the Description of price information field.

infoTextProvider.course: Enter the name of the organization hosting the course if the organizer is not the same as the publisher.
infoTextProvider.event: Enter the name of the organization hosting the event if the organizer is not the same as the publisher.

infoTextPublisher.course: Select the organization that will be displayed as the course publisher. You do not need to make a selection if you only have publishing rights for one organization.
infoTextPublisher.event: Select the organization that will be displayed as the event publisher. You do not need to make a selection if you only have publishing rights for one organization.

infoTextSocialMedia.course: Copy the course's social media links (URLs) here.
infoTextSocialMedia.event: Copy the event's social media links (URLs) here.

form.infoTextType1: Is it an event or a course? The event is a one-time event and starts at a certain time, while the course can generally have several events and the activities are goal-oriented. In some cases, the course is also called a hobby.
form.infoTextType2: The choice of event type affects how and in which services the event is displayed to the user.
form.infoTextUmrellaEvent1: Several different events can be grouped under the umbrella event. For example, a festival can be an umbrella event with several events underneath.
form.infoTextUmrellaEvent2: Umbrella event options can be left unchecked in most cases
form.infoTextUmbrellaSubEvent: If you wish to add this event under an umbrella event, you may do so from the associated

infoTextVideo1.course: If the course involves a video, you can add its address here.
infoTextVideo1.event: If the event involves a video, you can add its address here.

form.infoTextVideo2: Give the video a name and a brief description of what is happening in it.

labelHasUmbrella.course: This course has an umbrella event.
labelHasUmbrella.event: This event has an umbrella event.

labelInfoUrl.course: URL of the course home page {{langText}}
labelInfoUrl.event: URL of the event home page {{langText}}

labelIsUmbrella.course: This course is an umbrella event.
labelIsUmbrella.event: This event is an umbrella event.

labelProvider.course: Course organizer {{langText}} (if different than the publisher)
labelProvider.event: Event organizer {{langText}} (if different than the publisher)

placeholderAudienceMaxAge.course: Enter the maximum age for the course
placeholderAudienceMaxAge.event: Enter the maximum age for the event

placeholderAudienceMinAge.course: Enter the minimum age for the course
placeholderAudienceMinAge.event: Enter the minimum age for the event

placeholderDescription.course: Enter a description of the course
placeholderDescription.event: Enter a description of the event

placeholderFacebookUrl.course: Enter the URL of the course's Facebook page
placeholderFacebookUrl.event: Enter the URL of the event's Facebook page

placeholderInfoUrl.course: Enter the URL of the course home page {{langText}}
placeholderInfoUrl.event: Enter the URL of the event home page {{langText}}

placeholderInstagramUrl.course: Enter the URL of the course's Instagram page
placeholderInstagramUrl.event: Enter the URL of the event's Instagram page

form.placeholderLocation: Select or search for a venue
form.placeholderLocationExtraInfo: Enter more information about the venue {{langText}}
form.placeholderOfferDescription: Enter a description of the price information {{langText}}
form.placeholderOfferInfoUrl: Enter the URL for the ticket sale or registration {{langText}}

placeholderOfferPrice.course: Enter the price of the course {{langText}}
placeholderOfferPrice.event: Enter the price of the event {{langText}}

placeholderShortDescription.course: Enter a short description of the course
placeholderShortDescription.event: Enter a short description of the event

placeholderTwitterUrl.course: Enter the URL of the course's Twitter page
placeholderTwitterUrl.event: Enter the URL of the event's Twitter page

form.placeholderVideoAltText: Enter the alt text of the video for screen readers
form.placeholderVideoName: Enter a name for the video
form.placeholderVideoUrl: Enter the URL of the video

titleEnterEventTime.course: Enter the time of the course
titleEnterEventTime.event: Enter the time of the event

form.titleOfferInfoUrl: Link to ticket sales or registration
form.tooltipEventIsUmbrella: A sub event cannot be an umbrella event.

postponeEventModal.text1: This function postpones the event to the future. After postponing, you can later enter a new time for the event.
postponeEventModal.text2: The following events will be postponed:
postponeEventModal.textPastEventAreNotUpdated: Please also note that the changes only apply to future events in the series. Past events in the series are not postponed when postponing the roof event.
postponeEventModal.title: Postpone event
postponeEventModal.titlePastEventAreNotUpdated: Past events in the series will not be postponed

updateEventModal.text1: Data is stored for all events in this series. Changes to these events will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
updateEventModal.text2: The data is updated in the following events
updateEventModal.textPastEventAreNotUpdated: Please also note that the changes only apply to future events in the series. Past events in the series are not edited when editing the umbrella event.
updateEventModal.title: Save event
updateEventModal.titlePastEventAreNotUpdated: Past events in the series will not be edited

searchPanel.labelSearch: Search in the Linked Events interface
searchPanel.placeholderSearch: Search for events in the Linked Events interface

array.min: At least {{min}} item must be selected
array.min_plural: At least {{min}} item must be selected
array.required: At least 1 item must be selected

date.future: This date must be in the future
date.max: This date must be no later than {{max}}
date.min: This date must be at least {{min}}

validation.eventTimesRequired: At least 1 time must be added

string.date: This field must be a valid date
string.email: This field must be a valid email
string.max: This field can be up to {{max}} characters long
string.min: This field must be at least {{min}} characters long
string.time: Time must be given in the following format hh.mm
string.url: Enter the URL in correct format (http://...)

time.max: This time must be no later than {{max}}
time.min: This date must be at least {{min}}

contactPage.text: Contact us using the form below.

platformPage.textApi: The public API allows you to retrieve events for your own service. You can also suggest us an existing databank that should be linked to Linked Events.
platformPage.textEventManagement: The Linked Events control panel is used to enter events, courses, and volunteer assignments, and to manage related information and materials.
platformPage.textMainContent1: Linked Events is an open interface developed by the City of Helsinki for events, courses and volunteer assignments in the City of Helsinki. This site provides tools and instructions for managing them and documentation to use the public interface.
platformPage.textMainContent2: Events may be entered with the permission of the city. They don’t have to be organized by the city. You can enter multiple dates for an event. In this case, an umbrella event is automatically created for the event sequence.
platformPage.textSupport: Contact us if you would like more information or have any suggestions on how we could improve the service. In the Help section, you will find more detailed information and a contact form.

image.warningLogInToUpdate: Sign in to edit this image.
image.warningNoRightsToUpdate: You have insufficient rights to edit this image.
image.warningNoRightsToUpload: You have insufficient rights to add images.

logoutPage.text: You have been logged out of the service. Log back in or return to the home page.

notFound.text: The content you were looking for could not be found. Log in or return to the home page.

notSigned.text: You must be logged in to view this content. Log in or return to the home page.
